title: Getting Started with Phoenix and PhoenixStatic
content:
Introduction

Phoenix is a productive web framework that does not compromise speed or maintainability. PhoenixStatic extends Phoenix by allowing you to generate static pages at compile time from external content sources like CMSs.

Why Static Generation?

Static generation offers several benefits:

  • Improved performance - pages are pre-rendered
  • Better SEO - search engines can easily crawl static content
  • Reduced server load - no database queries at runtime
  • Enhanced security - fewer attack vectors

Integration with Strapi

This example demonstrates how to use Strapi CMS as a content source for PhoenixStatic. Content is fetched during compilation and converted into optimized static HTML pages.

title: Building Scalable Web Applications with Elixir
content:
The Power of Elixir

Elixir is a dynamic, functional language designed for building maintainable and scalable applications. Built on top of the Erlang Virtual Machine (BEAM), Elixir leverages the Actor model to achieve massive concurrency.

Key Features

  • Fault tolerance through supervision trees
  • Lightweight processes (not OS threads)
  • Hot code swapping
  • Distributed computing support

Phoenix Framework

Phoenix brings the best of both worlds - the productivity of Ruby on Rails with the performance and reliability of Elixir.

title: Modern Web Design Principles
content:
Design in the Modern Web

Web design has evolved significantly over the past decade. Today's websites need to be fast, accessible, and provide excellent user experiences across all devices.

Key Principles

Mobile-First Design

Start designing for mobile devices and progressively enhance for larger screens.

Performance Optimization

Optimize images, minimize HTTP requests, and use efficient CSS and JavaScript.

Accessibility

Ensure your website is usable by people with disabilities by following WCAG guidelines.

User Experience

Focus on clear navigation, intuitive interfaces, and fast loading times.

title: Content Management with Strapi
content:
What is Strapi?

Strapi is an open-source headless CMS that gives developers the freedom to choose their favorite tools and frameworks while providing editors with an easy-to-use interface to manage content.

Benefits of Headless CMS

  • API-first approach
  • Technology agnostic
  • Scalable architecture
  • Developer-friendly

Integration with Phoenix

Using Strapi with Phoenix and PhoenixStatic allows you to:

  • Manage content through a user-friendly interface
  • Generate static pages for optimal performance
  • Maintain separation between content and presentation
